cgcloud__Contract_Tactic__c.name: cgcloud__Contract_Tactic__c
cgcloud__Contract_Tactic__c.description: Relation between a Contract and a Tactic template.

cgcloud__Contract_Tactic_Template__c.description: Reference to the contract tactic template.

cgcloud__Contract__c.description: Reference to the customer contract object.

cgcloud__Cost_Amount__c.description: The amount agreed with the customer as a compensation for fulfilling this tactic.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the contract tactic.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: First date of validity period of the contract tactic.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Last date of validity period of the contract tactic.
